title: Regular Scrim Teams
body: Looking for regular teams for my team to scrim against, will mostly be 2 - 3 days per week, add wako487 in game and message me if interested.

replies.body: What rank is your team? (Average rank of players)

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=cpqGIHc3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-19T11:46:53.441+0000)
>
> What rank is your team? (Average rank of players)

racist
silver 4 - gold 4, we have 1 unranked but he doesn't play ranked.. he'll be silver within a month or so.

Hello Wako487, I've added you ingame. Our team QUICKFIRE Academy would love to scrim you guys.

We are currently 3 silvers and 2 golds
add me on league and we'll organise something
